document_data.mainbody: Altymo Phaernphar was a maker of harps and owner of Phaernphars Fine Harps in the city of Silverymoon in the Silver Marches in the late 14 century DR. Around 1372 DR, Altymo was a regular client of Chesmyr Morrowynd, a maker of harp strings, and they met to do business in Swordsfall House.
